themes: insufficient advance outreach to diverse communities
lack of culturally competent and bilingual trainers
inadequate language accessibility in program materials and surveys
superficial approaches to diversity and inclusion
poor timing and communication about deadlines
key_phrases: outreach, training, and planning for diverse communities to happen months ahead of the deadlines
not see information sessions and promotion one week before the due date
competent trainers who are bilingual and can understand the community
instead of just hiring interpreters at the last minute
trainers who do not understand the struggles and the artist's culture
WHY is this survey not available in Spanish or Vietnamese?
It is an afterthought to have a one-liner catch phrase to cover diversity
"if you have issues, please email me to ask for help". That is not OUTREACH.
barriers_identified: program materials and surveys not available in Spanish or Vietnamese
solutions_proposed: outreach, training, and planning for diverse communities to happen months ahead of the deadlines
use competent, bilingual trainers who understand the community
make surveys and materials available in Spanish and Vietnamese
move beyond superficial diversity statements to real outreach
